Summary: Set up a new development environment in under 5 minutes
Description: As a developer, I want to be able to set up a new development environment in under 5 minutes so that I can start contributing to the project quickly.

Summary: Review and update the DEVELOPER_ONBOARDING.md document
Description: Review and update the DEVELOPER_ONBOARDING.md document to ensure it is accurate and up-to-date.

Summary: Create a docker-compose.override.yml file
Description: Create a docker-compose.override.yml file to allow for easier local development overrides.

Summary: Investigate using a tool like direnv
Description: Investigate using a tool like direnv to automatically manage environment variables.

Summary: Have a clear and consistent code style
Description: As a developer, I want to have a clear and consistent code style so that the codebase is easy to read and maintain.

Summary: Configure eslint and prettier
Description: Configure eslint and prettier to enforce the code style guide.

Summary: Add a pre-commit hook
Description: Add a pre-commit hook that runs eslint and prettier before each commit.

Summary: Document the code style guide
Description: Document the code style guide in the CONTRIBUTING.md file.

Summary: Deploy the platform to a production environment with a single command
Description: As a platform operator, I want to be able to deploy the platform to a production environment with a single command.

Summary: Create a set of production-ready Docker images
Description: Create a set of production-ready Docker images.

Summary: Create a docker-compose.prod.yml file
Description: Create a docker-compose.prod.yml file for production deployments.

Summary: Write a comprehensive deployment guide
Description: Write a comprehensive deployment guide that covers different deployment scenarios (e.g., bare metal, Kubernetes).

Summary: Easily back up and restore the platform's data
Description: As a platform operator, I want to be able to easily back up and restore the platform's data.

Summary: Create scripts for backing up and restoring databases
Description: Create scripts for backing up and restoring the Neo4j, PostgreSQL, and TimescaleDB databases.

Summary: Document the backup and restore process
Description: Document the backup and restore process.

Summary: Have a robust testing framework
Description: As a developer, I want to have a robust testing framework so that I can be confident that my changes are not breaking anything.

Summary: Set up a CI/CD pipeline
Description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline that runs the full test suite on every pull request.

Summary: Add code coverage reporting
Description: Add code coverage reporting to the CI/CD pipeline.

Summary: Write a guide on how to write effective tests
Description: Write a guide on how to write effective tests for the platform.

Summary: See a visual representation of my data
Description: As an analyst, I want to be able to see a visual representation of my data so that I can easily identify connections and patterns.

Summary: Implement the Graph Explorer UI
Description: Implement the \Graph Explorer\" UI as described in velocity-plan-v6.md."

Summary: Integrate the Cytoscape.js library
Description: Integrate the Cytoscape.js library for graph visualization.

Summary: Allow users to customize the graph layout
Description: Allow users to customize the graph layout and appearance.

Summary: Interact with the graph to explore the data
Description: As an analyst, I want to be able to interact with the graph to explore the data.

Summary: Allow users to pan and zoom the graph
Description: Allow users to pan and zoom the graph.

Summary: Allow users to click on nodes and edges
Description: Allow users to click on nodes and edges to see more details.

Summary: Allow users to filter the graph
Description: Allow users to filter the graph based on node and edge properties.

Summary: Collaborate with my team in real-time
Description: As an analyst, I want to be able to collaborate with my team in real-time.

Summary: Implement real-time updates for the graph view
Description: Implement real-time updates for the graph view.

Summary: Add presence indicators
Description: Add presence indicators to show which users are currently active in an investigation.

Summary: Implement a chat feature
Description: Implement a chat feature for real-time communication.

Summary: Have a guided analysis experience
Description: As an analyst, I want to have a guided analysis experience so that I can be more effective in my investigations.

Summary: Implement the Copilot feature
Description: Implement the \Copilot\" feature as described in velocity-plan-v6.md."

Summary: Create a set of pre-defined analysis runbooks
Description: Create a set of pre-defined analysis \runbooks\" for common investigation scenarios."

Summary: Allow users to create their own custom runbooks
Description: Allow users to create their own custom runbooks.

Summary: Automatically identify potential connections and relationships
Description: As an analyst, I want the platform to automatically identify potential connections and relationships in my data.

Summary: Implement the GraphRAG feature
Description: Implement the \GraphRAG\" feature as described in VISION.md."

Summary: Use graph algorithms
Description: Use graph algorithms (e.g., community detection, centrality analysis) to identify key entities and relationships.

Summary: Use natural language processing (NLP)
Description: Use natural language processing (NLP) to extract entities and relationships from unstructured text.

Summary: Ask questions in natural language
Description: As an analyst, I want to be able to ask questions in natural language and get answers from the platform.

Summary: Implement a natural language query interface
Description: Implement a natural language query interface that translates user questions into GraphQL queries.

Summary: Use a large language model (LLM)
Description: Use a large language model (LLM) to generate natural language summaries of query results.

Summary: Easily integrate my own machine learning models
Description: As a data scientist, I want to be able to easily integrate my own machine learning models into the platform.

Summary: Create a Connector SDK
Description: Create a \Connector SDK\" as described in velocity-plan-v6.md."

Summary: Document the process for creating and deploying custom models
Description: Document the process for creating and deploying custom models.

Description: As an analyst, I want to be able to understand how the platform arrived at its conclusions.

Summary: Implement explainable AI (XAI) techniques
Description: Implement explainable AI (XAI) techniques to provide insights into how the AI models are making their decisions.

Summary: Visualize the evidence and provenance
Description: Visualize the evidence and provenance for each insight.

Summary: Easily import data from common file formats
Description: As an analyst, I want to be able to easily import data from common file formats.

Summary: Implement support for importing data from CSV, JSON, and XML files
Description: Implement support for importing data from CSV, JSON, and XML files.

Description: Add a user interface for mapping data from the source file to the IntelGraph schema.

Description: Create a framework for developing new connectors.

Description: Add metrics and logging to the data ingestion pipeline.

Description: As a user, I want to be able to securely log in to the platform.

Description: Implement JWT-based authentication with refresh token rotation.

Description: Add support for two-factor authentication (2FA).

Description: Implement role-based access control (RBAC).

Description: Implement the security controls outlined in THREAT_MODEL_STRIDE.md.

Description: Encrypt all data at rest and in transit.

Description: Regularly scan the platform for security vulnerabilities.

Description: Implement a comprehensive audit logging system.

Description: As a platform operator, I want to be able to monitor the health and performance of the platform in real-time.

Description: Set up a monitoring stack with Prometheus and Grafana.

Description: Create dashboards for monitoring key system metrics (e.g., CPU, memory, disk space).

Description: Integrate with a distributed tracing system like Jaeger or Zipkin.

Description: As a user, I want the platform to be fast and responsive.

Description: Identify and optimize slow-running queries.

Description: Implement caching for frequently accessed data.
